TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UICuesEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks A指定哪些使用者介面的功能變更，且其新值。A specifies which user interface feature changed and its new value. 使用者介面來顯示或隱藏焦點指標或鍵盤提示變更時，就會發生事件。這通常是當使用者按下 tab 鍵、 ALT 或 F10。The event occurs when the user interface changes by showing or hiding focus indicators or keyboard cues. This is usually when the user presses the TAB, ALT, or F10 keys. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#67](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#67)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#67](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#67)]
